business.headline: Dow Jones tumbles nearly 1,000 points as US stock markets crashTrump on Monday repeated his criticism of Fed Chair Jerome Powell and said the US economy could slow down unless interest rates are lowered immediately.

Former Fortis promoter Shivinder Singh files personal insolvency: ReportSingh has invoked Section 94 of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code (IBC), which allows individuals to file for insolvency if they are unable to repay debts. In his plea, Singh stated that his liabilities now exceed the value of his remaining assets.
Sensex, Nifty rise over 1% in fifth-day rally led by banking, IT gainsThe S&P BSE Sensex added 855.30 points to close at 79,408.50, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 273.90 points to end at 24,125.55.

Klaus Schwab steps down as World Economic Forum chairThe WEF thanked Schwab for his 55 years of dedicated leadership and for building what has become a premier global platform for dialogue and progress.

India hopes to seal US trade pact this year: Finance Minister Nirmala SitharamanNirmala Sitharaman is on a five-day trip to the United States, where she will attend the spring meetings of the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank, and the meeting of G20 finance ministers and central bank governors.

HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank hit record highs after strong Q4: Buy, hold or sell?HDFC Bank rose 1.3% while ICICI Bank gained 0.9% by 9:40 am. Their gains helped lift the Nifty Bank and Nifty Private Bank indices by nearly 2%, and pushed the Nifty 50 up 0.6%, with heavyweight HDFC Bank emerging as the index's top driver.

Sensex soars 1,000 points: Why is stock market rising today?Stock market today: The rally on Monday marks the fifth straight session of gains, showing that investor confidence is returning. Both Sensex and Nifty touched their highest levels since January 6.

Explained: Why Yes Bank share price rose nearly 7% todayThe Yes Bank stock was trading at Rs 18.95 on the BSE, marking a 4.75% jump. Gains continued through the morning, with the stock touching an intraday high of Rs 19.37, indicating that it rallied nearly 7%.

Stock market rally: Should investors consider small-cap, mid-cap stocks?With strong institutional inflows and improved breadth in the market, analysts say the coming weeks could favour investors who are selectively increasing exposure to quality names in the midcap and smallcap universe.

Gold price nears Rs 1 lakh-mark amid global uncertainty. Should you buy or sell?Gold price today: Monday's jump follows a dip in the previous session, where MCX Gold fell 0.44% to Rs 95,239 due to profit booking. But the broader narrative remains dominated by geopolitical and macroeconomic anxiety.

'Era of salaryman is over': Saurabh Mukherjea warns India's middle classSpeaking on a recent podcast titled Beyond the Paycheck: India's Entrepreneurial Rebirth, Saurabh Mukherjea issued a clear and unsettling warning: salaried employment, long considered the golden path to financial security, is dying.
Sensex, Nifty rally as strong Q4 results from banks lift market confidenceThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 635.70 points to 79,188.90, while the NSE Nifty50 added 200.30 points to 24,051.95 as of 10:33 am.

entertainment.headline: New Oscar rules require voters to watch every nominee, support refugee filmmakersThe Academy now requires Oscar voters to watch all nominated films in a category. New rules support refugee filmmakers, clarify AI use, and introduce future awards for casting and stunt design

Bhabiji... actor Shubhangi Atre's ex-husband Piyush Poorey dies in IndoreShubhangi Atre's former husband, Piyush Poorey, passed away after battling liver cirrhosis in Indore. The actor was not on talking terms with her husband after their divorce earlier this year.

Rapper Hanumankind shares glimpse of debut Coachella performance. WatchRapper Hanumankind made his US debut at Coachella 2025 and shared his journey to the festival on Instagram, showcasing his experiences from rehearsals to the stage.

Who Is Dylan Meyer? All About Kristen Stewart's WifeFrom secret scripts to shared vows, Kristen Stewart and Dylan Meyer's Hollywood love story turns a new page with an intimate LA wedding, blending romance, creativity, and quiet celebration.

Justin Bieber's Coachella 2025 videos make fans worried about singer's healthJustin Bieber's recent Coachella 2025 appearance has sparked concern among fans due to videos showing him disoriented and erratic, raising questions about his health and well-being.

Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava crosses Rs 600 crore-mark on Day 66 despite OTT releaseVicky Kaushal's film 'Chhaava' continues to dominate the box office even after its Netflix release, crossing Rs 600 crore in just 66 days. It is the third Hindi film to reach the milestone.

BLACKPINK Jennie gets emotional during Coachella, says 'Mom, I Love You'BLACKPINK member Jennie gave an electric solo performance at Coachella 2025. She had an emotional moment mid-performance and said "Mom, I love you" in Korean.

K-pop group SEVENTEEN announces album Happy Burstday ahead of 10 year anniversaryK-pop sensation SEVENTEEN has unveiled their fifth album 'Happy Burstday', set to release on May 26. The group also announced an upcoming tour and additional content.

Sinners hits $61 million worldwide in opening weekend, matches to Minecraft MovieWarner Bros 'Sinners', starring Michael B Jordan and Hailee Steinfeld, debuted to $61 million globally, aligning with overseas expectations. Meanwhile, 'A Minecraft Movie' continues its robust box office run, nearing $721 million worldwide.

Sparsh Shrivastava admits to being stereotyped: But I have different perspectiveActor Sparsh Shrivastava discusses dealing with stereotyping in the film industry. He also expressed that the labels should be removed, citing example of how veteran actors used to do specific roles multiple times.

Rajkummar Rao set to replace Aamir Khan in Ujjwal Nikam biopic: ReportActor Rajkummar Rao is in talks to play prosecutor Ujjwal Nikam in an upcoming biopic. Aamir Khan, who was originally playing the part, has stepped down and will now produce the film alongside Dinesh Vijan.

Babil Khan on seeking his mother's validation: Baba did the same with his motherBabil Khan, son of the late actor Irrfan, continues to seek his mother Sutapa's validation in all aspects of his life, much like his father did. Currently, he is celebrating the success of his latest film Logout, which recently premiered on Zee5 .

Jr NTR to begin shooting for Prashanth Neel's film on April 22 in KarnatakaThe makers have released a picture featuring Jr NTR and Prashanth Neel ahead of the new shoot schedule, where NTR is set to join the team on April 22.

Allu Arjun's look test for Atlee's film kickstarts in Mumbai: ReportAllu Arjun and director Atlee are currently in Mumbai prepping for their upcoming film, 'AA 22'. Reportedly, they are working on the look test and concept shoot.

Jonathan Pryce to Robbie Coltrane: Hollywood actors who played Pope on screenPope Francis died on April 21, weeks after battling double pneumonia. With the death of the 88-year-old spiritual head, take a look at all the Hollywood stars who played the Pope on-screen.

Ugramm to Apthamithra: 5 Kannada films that deserves a re-release in 2025Since the re-release trend is going strong across the country, here are 5 Kannada films that deserve a grand re-release in Karnataka, just like Puneeth Rajkumar's 'Appu', in 2025.

Why Ralph Fiennes' Conclave matters in a post-Pope Francis eraPope Francis' sudden death during Easter has left the world in shock. As the Vatican prepares for the conclave, questions arise about the future of the Catholic Church.

Actor Samantha reflects on her early roles: Feel embarrassed watching them nowActor Samantha, during a recent college visit for her film promotions, candidly spoke about her experience as a producer and admitted feeling embarrassed about her early acting performances.

Randeep Hooda, family meet PM Modi: His pat on the back is great encouragementActor Randeep Hooda, along with his mother and sister, met Prime Minister Narendra Modi in New Delhi. He shared pictures from the meet and greet on social media.

general news.headline: PM hosts JD Vance in Delhi, leaders welcome significant progress in trade dealPrime Minister Narendra Modi met US Vice President JD Vance and his family at his official residence in Delhi. Both leaders discussed issues of mutual interest and welcomed the "significant progress" in the first phase of the bilateral trade deal.

Pope Francis died of stroke, irreversible heart failure: Vatican doctorPope Francis died early Monday after suffering a stroke and heart failure, according to a death certificate released by Vatican doctor Andrea Arcangeli. The document noted he fell into a coma before passing.

'You'll be killed like your father': Baba Siddique's son gets death threatZeeshan Siddique, son of former state minister Baba Siddique, who was shot last year, received a death threat through his email. Zeeshan has received several such death threats ever since his father's murder.

Was very ill: JD Vance recalls last meeting with Pope before India visitPope Francis made his final public appearance on Easter Sunday, greeting thousands in St. Peter's Square and briefly meeting US Vice President JD Vance. Despite a recent illness, he delivered his Easter blessing before passing away.

Watch: Peacock feathers, lap time — PM Modi hosts JD Vance's children in DelhiPrime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday gifted peacock feathers to US Vice President JD Vance's children — Ewan, Vivek, and Mirabel — as part of a warm and personalised welcome at his residence, 7 Lok Kalyan Marg.

The gesture came during a light-hearted interaction where the Prime Minister was seen showing the Vance family around. A video from the visit shows the Prime Minister playfully engaging with Ewan and Vivek, who were seen sitting on his lap and chatting with him.

The Vance family — JD, Usha, and their three children — are in India on an official four-day visit. On Tuesday, they will visit Jaipur, followed by a trip to the iconic Taj Maha on Wednesday.

Clinical Gujarat hammer hapless Kolkata to tighten grip on top spotIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: Shubman Gill's Gujarat Titans beat Ajinkya Rahane's Kolkata Knight Riders by 39 runs at the Eden Gardens to secure their sixth win of the competition and strengthened their grip on the top of the points table.

Bhaiya sorry: Man pleads as bodybuilders thrash him, smash his superbikeThe incident occurred on Sunday when the bike riders had left Gurugram's Ambience Mall for Panchgaon to eat paranthas. A road rage incident reportedly occurred on the Dwarka Expressway, during which the bodybuilders came face to face with a biker and assaulted him.

'We are open to peace': Putin's first call for Ukraine talks in yearsRussian President Vladimir Putin proposed bilateral peace talks with Ukraine, expressed openness to ceasefires, and emphasized dialogue
The summer skin regime: How to stay fresh and youthfulFrom facials and chemical peels to hydrating foods and serums, how to protect yourself from the harsh summer sun

Twist in Bengaluru road rage? CCTV shows Air Force officer assaulting manCCTV footage of a road rage incident in Bengaluru shows IAF officer's alleged attack. The officer had posted a video on social media showing his bloodied face, saying he was attacked by a local resident, while his wife was abused.

Why Ralph Fiennes' Conclave matters in a post-Pope Francis eraPope Francis' sudden death during Easter has left the world in shock. As the Vatican prepares for the conclave, questions arise about the future of the Catholic Church.

Pope Francis survived pneumonia, report reveals likely cause of deathIt wasn't pneumonia that Pope Francis battled for months that might be the cause of his death. Italian news agency ANSA reported, quoting sources, that the likely cause of his demise was a stroke, and not respiratory illness. An official confirmation will only come from the Vatican.
Watch: Women climb down dry well as Nashik village faces severe water crisisWith no other option, women are forced to descend into dry and crumbling wells just to fetch a few pots of water.

I was poisoned, held hostage: Ex-Karnataka top cop's wife in messages before murderDisturbing messages, reportedly sent by Pallavi, former Karnataka DGP Om Prakash's wife and the prime accused in his murder, showed she believed she was constantly under surveillance, long before she allegedly stabbed him.

Pope Francis is dead. What's next?Pope Francis' passing triggers centuries-old Vatican rituals that honour his legacy and mark the end of an era. As the Roman Catholic Church mourns and prepares for a historic conclave, a new chapter in faith and leadership is set to begin.

Ex-Karnataka top cop was having lunch when wife stabbed him: SourcesMore details uncovered during the ongoing investigation into the murder of former Karnataka Director General of Police (DGP) Om Prakash show that he was seated at the dining table having lunch when he was stabbed.

Usha Vance in fiery red, kids in desi outfits arrive in Delhi with JD VanceUS Second Lady Usha Vance arrived in Delhi with her husband, JD Vance, and their kids. While she opted for a western look, she made sure the kids embraced their mother's desi roots.

Khalistani group won't be able to swing Canada election: Ex-envoy BisariaFormer Indian High Commissioner to Canada, Ajay Bisaria, said the "disproportionate capture" by an active Khalistani group in Canada won't impact the April 28 election. He said this was the time to stabilise Indo-Canada relations.

Delhi man signs up as Blinkit delivery agent, says untouchability isn't just caste-basedA Delhi-based man swapped his desk job for a day to work as a Blinkit delivery agent, and came back with a reality check most people choose to overlook.

Getting married soon? Gill's awkward reaction to Danny Morrison's questionIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: Shubman Gill became awkward after being asked about a personal question from Danny Morrison before the clash on Monday, April 21 at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata.

Why RSS centenary plan in Bengal is buzzing with electoral undercurrentsPolitical watchers see the 300-odd Hindu religious events and seer visits planned over the coming year as more than a devotional affair

India orders removal of Ablo: Here is everything you need to know about this appThe Indian government has directed Google to remove the Chinese video chat app Ablo from its Play Store. The reason behind this action is that the app displayed an incorrect map of India, misrepresenting the Union Territories of Jammu & Kashmir and Ladakh, and omitting the Lakshadweep Islands.

Ground Report: Death of Pope Francis leaves his followers in disbeliefPope Francis, 88, who was recovering from double pneumonia, has died at his residence in Casa Santa Marta, the Vatican said. Despite his declining health, Pope Francis made a rare appearance in a wheelchair on Sunday. In his final message, he stressed the critical need for freedom and peace, urging the world to reflect on these values amid ongoing global conflicts.

How Ishan Kishan got back his central contract: BCCI retainership explainedThe BCCI on Monday, April 21, announced annual retainership contracts for 34 senior men's team players. Ishan Kishan was handed back his contract despite not having played for India since November 2023.

sports.headline: Mondo Duplantis 2nd track and field star after Usain Bolt to win Laureus top honourPole Vault star Mondo Duplantis became the second track and field athlete after Usain Bolt to win the Laureus Sportsman Of The Year award on Monday, April 21. Apart from Duplantis, Simone Biles and Lamine Yamal were also honoured.

KKR captain Rahane blames Narine, Gurbaz after meek surrender vs GujaratKolkata Knight Riders captain Ajinkya Rahane blamed openers Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Sunil Narine for the team's loss against Gujarat Titans at the Eden Gardens. Rahane asked his players to be brave from the next game.

14 runs off 19 balls in 199 chase: KKR fans slam Venkatesh IyerVenkatesh Iyer caught the ire of Kolkata Knight Riders' fans after a horror show with the bat against Gujarat Titans at the Eden Gardens. Iyer scored 14 off 19 balls in 199 chase.

Bhogle, Doull kept away from KKR vs GT after curator controversyPopular commentators Harsha Bhogle and Simon Doull were absent from KKR's home game against Gujarat Titans on Monday, April 21. Bhogle and Doull were involved in a controversy with Eden curator Sujan Mukherjee at the start of the season.

Unlucky 90s: Shubman Gill matches Virat Kohli in wanted IPL recordGujarat Titans captain Shubman Gill got dismissed on 90 while playing against Kolkata on Monday, April 21. This was the second time that Gill was dismissed in his 90s.

Consider myself as an all-rounder for DC: Vipraj Nigam on his role in DelhiVipraj Nigam has said that he sees himself as an all-rounder for Delhi Capitals this season and wants to contribute with bat and ball for the team. Vipraj has been a star for DC this season, especially with the ball.
Devon Conway's father dies, CSK post heartfelt messageChennai Super Kings posted a heartfelt message for Devon Conway's father, Denton, who passed away. Conway has not played for CSK since April 11.

NFL Draft 2025: Date, time, rankings, predictions and all you need to knowThe 2025 NFL Draft will open the opportunity for teams to select top young talent for the upcoming season. The event is scheduled for Thursday, April 24 at Lambeau Field in Green Bay, Wisconsin.

Sachin Yadav beats Kishore Jena to win Federation Cup 2025Sachin Yadav beat Asian Games silver medallist Kishore Kumar Jena to win the Federation Cup on Monday. April, 21. Yashvir Singh and Sahil Silwal finished in the podium places alongside Yadav.

Sabalenka suffers shock defeat as Ostapenko wins Stuttgart OpenJelena Ostapenko defeated Aryna Sabalenka 6-4, 6-1 in the final and won the Stuttgart Open title. The Latvian also won her first clay-court title since the French Open in 2017.

Neeraj Chopra Classic in Bengaluru: Javelin star offers glimpse into dream projectIndia's most decorated Olympian Neeraj Chopra, in collaboration with JSW Sports, announced the launch of India's first-ever International Javelin competition, the Neeraj Chopra Classic 2025. The two-time Olympian, speaking to the press, shared updates about his 'dream' project, scheduled to be held on May 24 in Bengaluru.

Sudirman Cup 2025: Satwik-Chirag ruled out as India suffer big blow aheadIndia suffered a big blow ahead of the start of the Sudirman Cup 2025 as men's doubles pairing of Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty have been ruled out of the tournament due to sickness.

2025 Boston Marathon: Start time, TV channels, weather and all you need to knowThe Boston Marathon is one of the world's most iconic races. The race is held annually on Patriots' Day in Massachusetts. This year marks the 129th iteration of the race. With the runners preparing to race from Hopkinton to Boylston Street.

Rohit Sharma thanks Abhishek Nayar after smart knock vs CSKIPL 2025, MI vs CSK: Rohit Sharma scored a brilliant 76 off 45 balls and helped Mumbai Indians beat the Chennai Super Kings on Sunday, April 20 at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai.

Gillespie breached contract: PCB hits back over non-payment allegationsPakistan Cricket Board has hit back at former coach Jason Gillespie over allegations of non-payment of dues. PCB put out a statement slamming Gillespie, and stated that the Australian had breached their contract.

CSK's auction strategy slammed by Raina, Harbhajan: Ignored Pant, Rahul, ShreyasCSK's strategy during the IPL 2025 auction has been slammed by ex-players Suresh Raina and Harbhajan Singh after their embarrassing loss to MI on Sunday, April 20. Raina feels CSK let go of a lot of players during the auction.

2025 Stanley Cup Playoffs: Date, time, games, schedule, TV channels, and all you need to knowThe 2025 NHL Stanley Cup playoffs start this Saturday, April 19, and the stage is set for one of the most unpredictable and exciting postseasons in recent years. With traditional powerhouses like New York, Boston, and Chicago missing the cut, the spotlight now turns to fresh contenders.

Stephon Castle named Rookie of the Year NBA 2024-25, finalists for other major NBA awards announcedThe NBA has officially named San Antonio Spurs guard Stephon Castle as a finalist for the 2024-25 Kia NBA Rookie of the Year Award, capping off a sensational debut season with fans excitedly buzzing.

RR think they are doing some charity to cricket: Ambati RayuduFormer cricketer Ambati Rayudu has questioned Rajasthan Royals' philosophy amidst their poor form in the IPL 2025. Rayudu has remarked that Rajasthan believe that they are doing some kind of charity by investing in youngsters.

Watch: Rohit Sharma gets new nickname, special gift after MI vs CSK heroicsIPL 2025: Rohit Sharma found peak form, smashing a match-winning 76 off 45 balls against Chennai Super Kings on Sunday. The Mumbai Indians star was showered with praise during the dressing room celebrations at Wankhede Stadium.

Watch: Virat Kohli's Punjabi banter with Harpreet Brar during PBKS vs RCB gameIndia and Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Virat Kohli was seen having a banter with Punjab Kings' (PBKS) spinner Harpreet Brar in Punjabi during Match 37 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Ashish Nehra influenced Mohammed Siraj's IPL comeback: GT Director of CricketGujarat Titans (GT) Director of Cricket Vikram Solanki has revealed how head coach Ashish Nehra has had a massive influence on Mohammed Siraj's remarkable IPL comeback.

Watch: PSL team gifts Pakistan pacer 24k gold-plated Iphone 16 ProPSL 2025: Lahore Qalandars became the envy of the Pakistan Super League after they gifted their captain, Shaheen Afridi, a gold-plated IPhone 16 Pro on the sidelines of Easter.

Shubman Gill is developing as a captain with every game: GT Director of CricketGujarat Titans (GT) Director of Cricket Vikram Solanki has said that captain Shubman Gill is still developing as a captain with every game and is coming up with his own captaincy style.

Neeraj Chopra Classic in Bengaluru: Have invited Arshad Nadeem, says javelin starThe inaugural edition of the Neeraj Chopra Classic, a one-day javelin throw event, will be held in Bengaluru on May 24. Top athletes, including Anderson Peters and Yulius Yego, are expected to compete. Neeraj said he has invited Olympic champion Arshad Nadeem of Pakistan.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
